column4: Are there any ubuntu programs that can to virus/spyware checks on your drive with Windows on it to quarentine/delete Windows viruses?
So this will check for WINDOWS viruses/spywware aswell?
yes, it will check for all viruses (basically, just windows viruses, since there are practically no linux viruses :) )
I have it installed but how do I start it?
clamav is a terminal-based program. open a terminal, and you can run "clamscan" with various options.
and of course, "man clamscan" for all those options
there's also a gui for it, though y ou can try, called "clamtk". if you don't want to deal with the cli
good luck, let know if problems. :)
Can it scan another harddrive? Because I have Windows on another harddrive in the same computer.
How do I get it to scan my whole windows harddrive? Its just scanning files in the immediate directory
